paragraphs.content: There are two kinds of beings in heaven, namely: Angels, who are resurrected personages, having bodies of flesh and bones—
paragraphs.contentHtml: There are two kinds of beings in heaven, namely: Angels, who are resurrected personages, having bodies of flesh and bones—

paragraphs.content: For instance, Jesus said: Handle me and see, for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For instance, Jesus said: Handle me and see, for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.

paragraphs.content: Secondly: the spirits of just men made perfect, they who are not resurrected, but inherit the same glory.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Secondly: the spirits of just men made perfect, they who are not resurrected, but inherit the same glory.

paragraphs.content: When a messenger comes saying he has a message from God, offer him your hand and request him to shake hands with you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: When a messenger comes saying he has a message from God, offer him your hand and request him to shake hands with you.

paragraphs.content: If he be an angel he will do so, and you will feel his hand.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If he be an angel he will do so, and you will feel his hand.

paragraphs.content: If he be the spirit of a just man made perfect he will come in his glory; for that is the only way he can appear—
paragraphs.contentHtml: If he be the spirit of a just man made perfect he will come in his glory; for that is the only way he can appear—

paragraphs.content: Ask him to shake hands with you, but he will not move, because it is contrary to the order of heaven for a just man to deceive; but he will still deliver his message.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ask him to shake hands with you, but he will not move, because it is contrary to the order of heaven for a just man to deceive; but he will still deliver his message.

paragraphs.content: If it be the devil as an angel of light, when you ask him to shake hands he will offer you his hand, and you will not feel anything; you may therefore detect him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If it be the devil as an angel of light, when you ask him to shake hands he will offer you his hand, and you will not feel anything; you may therefore detect him.

paragraphs.content: These are three grand keys whereby you may know whether any administration is from God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: These are three grand keys whereby you may know whether any administration is from God.
